cells.content: Show me which users are most likely to churn by region

1. Load customer dataset
2. Filter to users with churn flag
3. Group by region
4. Count churn per region
5. Plot results as bar chart

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv('customers.csv')
churned = df[df['churn'] == True]
region_counts = churned['region'].value_counts()
region_counts.plot(kind='bar')
plt.title('Churned Users by Region')
plt.show()
Group Europe and UK together in the plot
